instructions: Touch and hold the attachment until a menu appears. Tap the Share button , then choose the app you want to use to open the attachment.
In a mailbox, tap the Filter emails button to turn on filtering. Tap Filtered by, then turn on Only Mail with Attachments.
Go to Settings , then tap Personal Hotspot > Wi-Fi Password. Enter a password of at least eight characters.

Tap the App Store icon on your iPhone. Select Search . In the Search box, enter Messenger . In the results list, tap either Messenger or Facebook Messenger . Tap Get to download the free Messenger app to your iPhone . Open the Messenger app and enter your Facebook username and password in the fields provided. If the Facebook app is installed on your phone, you are asked if you want to use the same Facebook credentials with Messenger. The Facebook Messenger app syncs with Facebook Messages at the Facebook website and loads your conversations.

Tap the conversation to open it. Type a message to continue where the chat left off. Select an icon next to the message input field to add a picture, insert a video, or record a voice message. Tap the smiley face in the response field to add a sticker, GIF, or emoji to the message. Tap the $ symbol to send or request money.

Tap the Compose icon. It looks like a piece of paper with a pen over it. In the New Message screen, go to the To field and enter the name of the Facebook recipient for your message. As you type a name, the friend selections change and are based on the characters you type. Type your message. Tap Return on the keyboard to send the message.
